book.author: Gambardella, Matthew
book.title: XML Developer's Guide
book.description: An in-depth look at creating applications with XML.

book.author: Ralls, Kim
book.title: Midnight Rain
book.description: A former architect battles corporate zombies, an evil sorceress, and her own childhood to become queen of the world.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Maeve Ascendant
book.description: After the collapse of a nanotechnology society in England, the young survivors lay the foundation for a new society.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: Oberon's Legacy
book.description: In post-apocalypse England, the mysterious agent known only as Oberon helps to create a new life for the inhabitants of London. Sequel to Maeve Ascendant.

book.author: Corets, Eva
book.title: The Sundered Grail
book.description: The two daughters of Maeve, half-sisters, battle one another for control of England. Sequel to Oberon's Legacy.

book.author: Randall, Cynthia
book.title: Lover Birds
book.description: When Carla meets Paul at an ornithology conference, tempers fly as feathers get ruffled.

book.author: Thurman, Paula
book.title: Splish Splash
book.description: A deep sea diver finds true love twenty thousand leagues beneath the sea.

book.author: Knorr, Stefan
book.title: Creepy Crawlies
book.description: An anthology of horror stories about roaches, centipedes, scorpions and other insects.

book.author: Kress, Peter
book.title: Paradox Lost
book.description: After an inadvertant trip through a Heisenberg Uncertainty Device, James Salway discovers the problems of being quantum.

book.author: O'Brien, Tim
book.title: Microsoft .NET: The Programming Bible
book.description: Microsoft's .NET initiative is explored in detail in this deep programmer's reference.

book.author: O'Brien, Tim
book.title: MSXML3: A Comprehensive Guide
book.description: The Microsoft MSXML3 parser is covered in detail, with attention to XML DOM interfaces, XSLT processing, SAX and more.

book.author: Galos, Mike
book.title: Visual Studio 7: A Comprehensive Guide
book.description: Microsoft Visual Studio 7 is explored in depth, looking at how Visual Basic, Visual C++, C#, and ASP+ are integrated into a comprehensive development environment.

book.author: García, María Elena
book.title: Cien Años de Soledad Digital
book.description: Una saga familiar en el mundo virtual donde la realidad y la tecnología se entrelazan en Macondo 2.0.

book.author: Thompson, James
book.title: The AI Revolution
book.description: An comprehensive exploration of artificial intelligence and its impact on society, business, and the future of humanity.

book.author: Nakamura, Yuki
book.title: Shadows of Mount Fuji
book.description: A detective uncovers ancient secrets while investigating a series of mysterious disappearances near Japan's sacred mountain.

book.author: Williams, Sarah
book.title: The Quantum Kitchen
book.description: A chef discovers that her recipes can alter reality at the quantum level, leading to hilarious and dangerous culinary adventures.

book.author: Brown, Michael
book.title: Sustainable Web Development
book.description: Learn how to build environmentally friendly websites and applications while maintaining performance and user experience.

book.author: López, Carlos
book.title: El Último Tango en París Virtual
book.description: Una historia de amor que transcurre entre la realidad y el metaverso, donde dos almas se encuentran más allá de las dimensiones físicas.

book.author: Blackwood, Victoria
book.title: The Haunted Algorithm
book.description: When a programmer discovers that her AI creation is haunted by the ghost of a deceased coder, reality becomes a nightmare of digital possession.

book.author: Chen, Li Wei
book.title: Dragon Scales and Data Streams
book.description: In a world where magic and technology coexist, a young dragon learns to code spells into digital reality, bridging ancient wisdom with modern innovation.

book.author: Johnson, Patricia
book.title: The Psychology of Remote Work
book.description: A comprehensive study on the mental health impacts, productivity patterns, and social dynamics of distributed workforce management.

book.author: Petrov, Vladimir
book.title: Red Square Blues
book.description: A former KGB agent turned jazz musician must use his old skills when a conspiracy threatens to destabilize modern Russia.

book.author: Anderson, Emma
book.title: Blockchain for Beginners
book.description: A clear and accessible introduction to blockchain technology, cryptocurrencies, and their potential applications across various industries.

book.author: Reyes, Sofia
book.title: Mariposas de Acero
book.description: La historia de tres mujeres luchadoras durante la revolución industrial en México, tejiendo sus destinos entre las fábricas y los ideales de libertad.

book.author: O'Connor, Sean
book.title: The Green Algorithm
book.description: How artificial intelligence and machine learning can be leveraged to combat climate change and create sustainable solutions for the planet.
